scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run copy-statics && NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify ] sources/app.js | uglifyjs - -m -c -o build/app.js
scripts.publish: mkdir -p docs && rm -rf docs/* && yarn run build && cp -a build/ docs
scripts.test: yarn run lint && browserify -t [ babelify ] tests/app.js | node | faucet
scripts.watch: yarn run clean && yarn run copy-statics && watchify -v -d -t [ babelify ] sources/app.js -o build/app.js
